channel.title: 508 Customs
channel.description:
Well, I've been snooping through google, and the threads here at MoparScape but I can't seem to figure it out.
How do I add customs to a 508 client?
For example, I'm using the TokkulScape source, clockwise's LD client has a custom cape and some other custom items, I learned his source is HD compatible so I switched to a HD Client, I just need to know how to transfer the customs over...

item.title: 508 Customs
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

[quote=“licorish55, post:1, topic:325745”]Well, I’ve been snooping through google, and the threads here at MoparScape but I can’t seem to figure it out.

How do I add customs to a 508 client?

For example, I’m using the TokkulScape source, clockwise’s LD client has a custom cape and some other custom items, I learned his source is HD compatible so I switched to a HD Client, I just need to know how to transfer the customs over…[/quote]

Don’t snoop to much, bad for your teeth…
xD
